Presentation.Title: Web & Mobile Developer
Presentation.Description: Currently a student in my third year of engineering studies, having completed my first two years in a preparatory class at CESI school in Caen, I am looking for a 17-week internship starting on September 4th, 2023. Passionate about computer science, I am also working on a web application similar to a social network with authentication and websockets, which you can find at the following address:

One.Description: Automony, Teamwork, Network, Development, Project Management, English

Two.Title: Integrated preparatory class: Computer Science minor

Three.Title: First year of Bachelor's degree in Physics with computer science option

One.Title: Web/Mobile Developer Internship - Qwice
One.Description: - Making an existing web application compatible with native Android/iOS mobile application with the framework Capacitor.js(android studio / xcode). - Adding push notifications to the application (firebase / php). - Adding and correcting features on the frontend (VueJs).

Two.Title: Full Stack Developer Internship
Two.Description: - Creation of a client management interface for server centralization (Laravel + Vue.js + MySQL). - Creation of bash scripts to determine the status of servers (bash). - Unit testing of the most critical functions (PHPUnit + Mockery).

Three.Title: Volunteer Fabmanager Assistant
Three.Description: Basic computer courses (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet, etc.) for beginners. - Use of fablab machines (3D printer, laser cutter, etc.).

Four.Title: Restaurant Employee
Four.Description: Preparation of customer orders (in the kitchen). - Customer service. - Cleaning of premises.

Five.Title: Laborer
Five.Description: Installation of medical oxygen and air pipes in hospitals. - Installation of medical oxygen and air wall outlets in hospitals. - Installation of medical oxygen and air plants in hospitals.

Six.Title: Laborer
Six.Description: Installation of medical oxygen and air pipes in hospitals. - Installation of medical oxygen and air wall outlets in hospitals. - Installation of medical oxygen and air plants in hospitals.

One.Title: Lahyra
One.Description: Lahyra is my biggest personal project. It was created using VueJS (JavaScript) for the frontend and Laravel for the backend (PHP). It has many features such as JWT (JSON web token) protected authentication, language management with I18n, photo upload with storage, and WebSocket integration with Pusher. By clicking on 'API Routes', you will find a list of all the routes functioning on the site (some of which are protected by administrator scopes).

Two.Title: Portfolio
Two.Description: My portfolio is a personal project created using VueJS (JavaScript) with Vuetify. It incorporates libraries such as I18n for translation, Axios for HTTP requests, and Vue Router for navigation. It also features a dark mode system that is stored in the local storage (similar to the language selection).

Three.Title: EasySave
Three.Description: EasySave is a file backup software. It was a school project developed by a team of 4 students. I was responsible for the software development, particularly using the MVVM pattern. It was built with: - Visual Studio 2022 (Enterprise version) - Visual Paradigm (for diagrams) - Azure Repos Version 1.0

Four.Title: Discord Bot
Four.Description: My first Discord bot to learn JavaScript.
